article_title: President Obama and Congress Constructively Seize Private Property

article_metadata.description: President Obama and Congress Constructively Seize Private Property Many years ago, I managed a restaurant with a nasty landlord. In negotiating a 10-year lease, he wanted a provision that if I changed the menu in any way, the lease would go into default. I asked him "you mean if I change [...]
